subject: RE: [junit] Eclipse - JUnit Configuration?
msgSnippet: Problem RESOLVED!    Thank you. Whan ZoneAlarm prompted, I told it to accept and remember the connection to 127.0.0.1:####  and to 0.0.0.0:####. This granted
messageBody:
Problem RESOLVED! Thank you.

Whan ZoneAlarm prompted, I told it to accept and remember the connection
to 127.0.0.1:#### and to 0.0.0.0:####.
This granted permission for javaw.exe:
Access - Trusted
Access - Internet
Server - Trusted
Server - Internet

I, then, was able to run each of the two sample JUnit test programs and
get the 'green bar' every time.

Again, Thank you.

Clark Anderson
